thread.title: Great Location & AWESOME Customer Service!! - Review
thread.title_full: Great Location & AWESOME Customer Service!! - Review of SpringHill Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Fifth Avenue, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: slicktop
title: Great Location & AWESOME Customer Service!! - Review
text:
My wife and I stayed here for a quick two night stay Valentines weekend.
Great location to do everything we wanted. The room is what you would expect in NYC. Yes small but had pretty much everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The bathroom is a little awkward with its design but is manageable. Having a mini fridge was also a plus. The included breakfast is also what to expect. A heard of people acting like they haven't eaten in a week. But we didn't come to NYC to eat Hotel food..Lol Housekeeping was also spot on.
But what stood out was the AWESOME customer service. Isa, who checked us in and out, did a GREAT job and was super friendly and responsive. If we needed something she went out of her way to either provide it or point us in the right direction to get it.
Would recommend this hotel and would stay here again!
